TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MATCH_MATRIXCODEMASTER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.MATRIX_DESC as MATRIX_DESC, A.REVENUE_CTGRY as REVENUE_CTGRY, A.MATRIX_CD as MATRIX_CD FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_MATRIXCODEMASTER A WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup policy on multiple match
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Use First Value

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: MATRIX_CD = i_INFINIUM_GL_CODE_PART

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Null ordering
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Null Is Highest Value

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION:
Dummy Mapping to Set Start Date for CPPH Updates using Merge Statement in PRE-SQL of Source
ALM-17886 : For CONTRACT_PRODUCT, CONTRACT_PROMOTION, CONTRACT_REWARD, CONTRACT_TAX mappings in delta logic, if there is a rate change on a recurring product/service, then change the start date of the product parts to the minimum start_date of the parts which have a rate change (ACTIVITY_FLAG =U)
MAPPING.NAME: m_SET_START_DATE_FOR_UPDATES

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION:
Dummy Table:
MERGE Query in PRE_SQL of transformation
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_DUAL

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT 'DUMMY' FROM DUAL

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: MERGE INTO $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST A USING ( SELECT CPPH_UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID,ETL_CYCLE_ID, MIN_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM from $$STG_SCHEMA.V_CPPH_FTCH_MIN_CONH_EFEC_FROM) B on (A.CPPH_UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID=B.CPPH_UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID and A.ACTIVITY_FLAG='U' and A.DELTA_OR_MONTHLY='DELTA' and A.ETL_CYCLE_ID=B.ETL_CYCLE_ID and A.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID and A.STG_TABLE_NAME in ('S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT', 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION', 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO', 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG')) when matched then update set A.CPPH_START_DATE=B.MIN_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM,A.UPDATED_BY='MERGE';

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_STAGING_TABLE_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_LPG_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CONTRACT_NUMBER, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_PRORATION_GROUP_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_PRODUCT_PART_CODE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_START_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_END_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_RECUR_PER_ST_DAY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_INIT_PRORATED_BILL_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FIRST_BILLING_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_BILLING_DAY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_QUANTITY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_UNITS, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_UNIT_TYPE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_ACCR_ACCT_TYPE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FREQUENCY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_PRICE_CLASS_CODE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_MONTHLY_FV, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_HOPPER_STATUS, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_SPAN_ID, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_TYPE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_PERIOD, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_TOTAL_INTEREST, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_INTEREST_RATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_DOWN_PAYMENT, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FINANCING_LIABILITY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EXPECTED_LIFE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_COLLECTIBILITY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_ALLOCATION_GROUPS, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_ACTION_TYPE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_RELATED_CPP_NUMBER, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FACILITY_CAPTURE_NO, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FACILITY_RELEASE_NO, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_RELEASE_TYPE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_FACILITY_ORDER, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CREATION_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_1, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_2, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_3, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_4, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_5, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_6, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_7, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_8, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_9, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_10, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_INPUT_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CREATED_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CREATED_BY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.UPDATED_BY, S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.ETL_CYCLE_ID, SUBSTR(S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER,-(LENGTH(S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER)-INSTR(S_TXN_CPPH_HIST.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER,''-'',-1,1))) AS SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID FROM TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Reward or Auto that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.REWARD_OR_AUTO_CHARGE_ID, NVL(A.AMOUNT,0) AMOUNT, C.PROF_MAP_CD, C.DPI_ENVRN, C.TARIF_CD, C.SVC_TYPE, C.PRD_CD, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, E.BILLING_CYCLE, A.EFFECTIVE_DATE , A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILL_DATE, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.PRD_CATLG_KEY, A.USI, A.RECCURING_FLAG, D.END_DATE, A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, C.CORE_PRD, G.LDR_CHLNG_CD, C.LDR_RATE, C.CHLNG_RATE, CS.AVG_CTRCT_DUR, A.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, A.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG, A.FIRST_EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM ( select Y.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, Y.REWARD_OR_AUTO_CHARGE_ID, NVL(Y.AMOUNT,0) AMOUNT, Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG, Y.EFFECTIVE_DATE , Y.FIRST_BILL_DATE, Y.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, Y.PRD_CATLG_KEY, Y.USI, Y.RECCURING_FLAG, Y.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER,Y.WIRE_CENTER, Y.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT, Y.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG, Y.FIRST_EFFECTIVE_DATE from $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO Y WHERE Y.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND Y.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND NOT (NVL(Y.RECCURING_FLAG,'null') = 'N' and NVL(Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG,'null')='O') -- to filter one time part ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON A.PRD_CATLG_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND A.FIRST_EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_REF_WRCTR G ON A.WIRE_CENTER = G.WRCTR_NO AND G.CURRENT_FLAG ='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_REF_CUST_SEG CS ON A.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT = CS.CUST_SEG_CD AND CS.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'
/* Fix for Initial Load cross Join*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST H ON H.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY=E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY and H.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY =A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and H.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (select X.ID,X.ETL_CYCLE_ID,X.CYCLE_BEGIN, X.CYCLE_END,X.BILL_DATE FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE X WHERE X.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID ) F ON H.BILL_CYCLE_ID=F.ID /* ends here */ --WHERE --A.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' --AND A.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID --AND F.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I','I', IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, 'B','U','O') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B',i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG,'B','U') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='Z','I', i_ACTIVITY_FLAG)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_ACTIVITY_FLAG

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF( i_FIRST_BILL_DATE<TO_DATE($$HISTORY_END_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI),
TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER)|| '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI)||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'))
--TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) --|| '-' || --TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY) --|| '-' || --TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) --|| '-' || --TO_CHAR(i_USI)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(1,i_PROF_MAP_CD ='INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' AND (v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' OR v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U'),ADD_TO_DATE(i_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'MONTH', i_AVG_CTRCT_DUR), i_PROF_MAP_CD <>'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' AND i_RECURRING_FLAG='Y' AND (v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' OR v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U'),i_CONTRACT_END_DATE, i_PROF_MAP_CD <>'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' AND i_RECURRING_FLAG='N' AND (v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' OR v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U'), i_EFFECTIVE_DATE, (v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' OR v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B' ),i_CYCLE_END_DATE )
--DECODE (1,i_RECURRING_FLAG='Y' AND in(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG ,'I','U'),i_CONTRACT_END_DATE, --i_RECURRING_FLAG='N' --AND in(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG ,'I','U'),i_EFFECTIVE_DATE, -- in(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG ,'O','B') --i_EFFECTIVE_DATE --) --i_EFFECTIVE_DATE
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_END_DATE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD) , IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),'C', IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),'L','C')), i_LDR_CHLNG_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_LDR_CHLNG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(1, v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),i_LDR_RATE , (ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE), i_CHLNG_RATE, i_AMOUNT)
--DECODE(1, i_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),i_LDR_RATE , --(ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR i_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE), i_CHLNG_RATE, --i_AMOUNT)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(1,v_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' AND i_CYCLE_END_DATE < v_CPPH_END_DATE,i_CYCLE_END_DATE, NULL )
--IIF (v_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' , i_CONTRACT_END_DATE,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I', v_CPPH_START_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U' or v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B', i_CYCLE_BEGIN_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),i_CYCLE_BEGIN_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND NOT ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: o_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE!=0 OR o_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV!=0

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Gift that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.PRD_CATLG_KEY, A.GIFT_ID, CASE WHEN A.EVENT_TYPE LIKE '%CAPTURE%' THEN A.IN_DATE WHEN A.EVENT_TYPE LIKE '%RELEASE%' THEN A.GIFT_SEND_DATE WHEN A.EVENT_TYPE LIKE '%WRITE%' THEN F.CYCLE_BEGIN ELSE A.IN_DATE END AS IN_DATE,/* added this condition to populate the IN_DATE according to the event_type*/ A.VALUE, C.DPI_ENVRN, C.TARIF_CD, C.SVC_TYPE, C.PRD_CD, C.PROF_MAP_CD, D.START_DATE, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.BILLING_CYCLE, D.END_DATE, A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILL_DATE, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, A.USI, C.CORE_PRD, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, A.EVENT_TYPE, F.CYCLE_END, C.REDMPT_PCT, C.LDR_RATE, C.CHLNG_RATE, W.LDR_CHLNG_CD FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON A.PRD_CATLG_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND A.IN_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_REF_WRCTR W ON A.WIRE_CENTER=W.WRCTR_NO AND W.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' /* Fix for Initial Load cross Join*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST G ON G.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY=E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY and G.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY =A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and G.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE F ON G.BILL_CYCLE_ID=F.ID /* ends here */ WHERE A.PROCESS_CYCLE= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND A.EVENT_TYPE<>'DISQUALIFY' AND F.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID $$GIFT_RECORD_PMC_FILTER

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE', 'THIRD_PARTY_RELEASE', i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE', 'THIRD_PARTY_CANCEL', i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE', 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_RELEASE', i_PROF_MAP_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE', 0, i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE', 0, i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE', 1, 1)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_UNITS

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD) , IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),'C', IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),'L','C')), i_LDR_CHLNG_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_LDR_CHLNG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' AND NOT ISNULL(i_REDMPT_PCT) , (i_REDMPT_PCT* i_VALUE), i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' AND ISNULL(i_REDMPT_PCT) , i_VALUE, i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE',$$MONTHLY_CHARGE, i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE', $$MONTHLY_CHARGE, i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF', $$MONTHLY_CHARGE,$$MONTHLY_CHARGE)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF (i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE',$$MONTHLY_CHARGE , IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' AND i_VALUE=0, (IIF(v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),i_LDR_RATE , IIF((ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),i_CHLNG_RATE))), IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' AND i_VALUE<>0,i_VALUE, IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE', $$MONTHLY_CHARGE, IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF', $$MONTHLY_CHARGE, $$MONTHLY_CHARGE ) ) ) ) )
--IIF (i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE',$$MONTHLY_CHARGE , --IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' AND i_VALUE=0, --(IIF(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),i_LDR_RATE , --IIF((ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR i_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),i_CHLNG_RATE))), --IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' AND i_VALUE<>0,i_VALUE, --IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE', $$MONTHLY_CHARGE,$$MONTHLY_CHARGE) --) --) --)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' ,'FACILITY_ACTION',--Write-off event is covered i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' ,'FACILITY_ACTION', i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' ,'FACILITY_RLS_FULL', i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF' and i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' ,'FACILITY_RLS_FULL' ,'FACILITY_ACTION')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_ACTION_TYPE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF (i_EVENT_TYPE = 'CAPTURE' and (i_PROF_MAP_CD ='CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE') , TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY)||TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER)||TO_CHAR(i_USI), NULL)
--IIF (i_EVENT_TYPE <> 'RELEASE' and (i_PROF_MAP_CD ='CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE') , TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY), NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_FACILITY_CAPTURE_NO

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE <> 'CAPTURE' and (i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' ), TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY)||TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER)||TO_CHAR(i_USI),NULL)
--IIF(i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' and (i_PROF_MAP_CD= 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE' ), --TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || TO_CHAR(i_PRD_CATLG_KEY),NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_FACILITY_RELEASE_NO

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, (i_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE') AND (i_PROF_MAP_CD ='CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE'), 1, (i_EVENT_TYPE='RELEASE' OR i_EVENT_TYPE='WRITE-OFF' ) AND (i_PROF_MAP_CD ='CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='THIRD_PARTY_CAPTURE'), 2)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_FACILITY_ORDER

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF( i_FIRST_BILL_DATE<TO_DATE($$HISTORY_END_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || i_TAX_CODE ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_RELATED_PRODUCT) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_USI) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID) ||'-'|| i_PROMO_ID ||'-'|| i_PROMO_KEY ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE) , TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || i_TAX_CODE ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_RELATED_PRODUCT) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_USI) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID) ||'-'|| i_PROMO_ID ||'-'|| i_PROMO_KEY ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(i_DPI_IN_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' , v_CPPH_START_DATE, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U' or i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B', i_BILL_PERIOD_BEGIN_DATE, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),i_BILL_PERIOD_BEGIN_DATE, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND NOT ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract TAX or Surcharge that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: --new sq SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, TAX_CODE, SURCHARGE_CODE, RELATED_PRODUCT, AMOUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, ACTIVITY_FLAG, CYCLE_BEGIN, CYCLE_END, BILLING_CYCLE, FIRST_BILL_DATE, BILL_DATE, INFINIUM_GL_CODE, TAX_TRANSACTION_ID, USI, ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID, SOURCE_TAX_TYPE, CPPH_START_DATE, CPPH_END_DATE, CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE, CORE_PRD, CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_5, PROMO_ID, PROMO_KEY, PROMO_SEQUENCE, CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, DPI_IN_DATE FROM ( SELECT A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.TAX_CODE, A.SURCHARGE_CODE, A.RELATED_PRODUCT, A.AMOUNT, B.START_DATE, B.END_DATE, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, F.BILLING_CYCLE, A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILL_DATE, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.TAX_TRANSACTION_ID, A.USI, A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, A.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID, A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE, case when A.ACTIVITY_FLAG in ('I') and NVL(G.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID then NVL(G.CPPH_START_DATE,TMP.CPPH_START_DATE) when A.ACTIVITY_FLAG in ('I') and NVL(G.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)<>$$ETL_CYCLE_ID then F.CYCLE_BEGIN else A.CPPH_START_DATE end CPPH_START_DATE, NVL(G.CPPH_END_DATE,TMP.CPPH_END_DATE) CPPH_END_DATE, NVL(G.CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE,TMP.CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE)CPPH_PROFILE_MAP_CODE, NVL(G.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER,TMP.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER) CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER, NVL(G.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID) ETL_CYCLE_ID, MAX(NVL(G.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY NVL(G.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER,TMP.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER)) MAX_ETLID_FROM_CPPH, NVL(G.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_3 ,TMP.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_3)AS CORE_PRD, NVL(G.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_5,TMP.CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_5) CPPH_EX_ATTR_TEXT_5, A.PROMO_ID, A.PROMO_KEY, A.PROMO_SEQUENCE, case when A.ACTIVITY_FLAG in ('I') and NVL(G.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID then NVL(G.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT,TMP.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT) else A.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT end CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, A.PARENT_CHARGE_TYPE, A.DPI_IN_DATE FROM ( select Y.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, Y.TAX_CODE, Y.SURCHARGE_CODE,Y.RELATED_PRODUCT, Y.AMOUNT, case when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='Z' and nvl(Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG,'null') <>'O' then 'I' when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='B' and Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' then 'O' when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG in ('I','Z') and Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' then '' else Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG end as ACTIVITY_FLAG, Y.FIRST_BILL_DATE, Y.INFINIUM_GL_CODE,Y.TAX_TRANSACTION_ID,Y.USI,Y.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER,Y.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID, Y.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE,Y.PROMO_ID,Y.PROMO_KEY,Y.PROMO_SEQUENCE,Y.PRD_CATLG_KEY,Y.ETL_CYCLE_ID,Y.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, Y.PARENT_CHARGE_TYPE, Y.DPI_IN_DATE,Y.CPPH_START_DATE,Y.REWARD_EFFECTIVE_DATE from $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG Y WHERE Y.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND Y.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND NVL(Y.AMOUNT,0)!=0 and NOT (NVL(Y.PARENT_CHARGE_TYPE,'null')='T' and NVL(Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG,'null')='O') -- TAX CPP new activity flag should not be blank which will happen only when a Tax is outed over batches; before reaching to ARRE ever and case when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='Z' and nvl(Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG,'null') <>'O' then 'I' when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='B' and Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' then 'O' when Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG in ('I','Z') and Y.ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' then '' else Y.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG end is not null) A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT B ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = B.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND B.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON B.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' /* Fix for Initial Load cross Join*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST H ON H.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY=E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND H.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY =A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND H.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.ID,X.CYCLE_BEGIN,X.CYCLE_END,X.BILLING_CYCLE,X.BILL_DATE FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE X where X.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID) F ON H.BILL_CYCLE_ID=F.ID /* ends here */ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST G ON G.DELTA_OR_MONTHLY='DELTA' AND G.STG_TABLE_NAME IN ('S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT','S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO','S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' ) AND G.ETL_CYCLE_id>0 AND ( ( G.STG_TABLE_NAME = 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' and A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE ='P' AND G.TAX_CON_PROD_PART_NUM= TO_CHAR(A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.PRD_CATLG_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) || '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.USI) || '-' || TO_CHAR(A.DPI_IN_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) OR ( G.STG_TABLE_NAME = 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO' and A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE ='R' AND G.TAX_CON_PROD_PART_NUM= TO_CHAR(A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.PRD_CATLG_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) || '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.USI) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(A.REWARD_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) OR ( G.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' and A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE ='O' AND G.TAX_CON_PROD_PART_NUM=TO_CHAR(A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.RELATED_PRODUCT)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(A.USI)||'-' ||TO_CHAR(A.PROMO_ID)||'-' || TO_CHAR(A.PROMO_KEY)||'-'||TO_CHAR(A.PROMO_SEQUENCE) || '-'||TO_CHAR(A.DPI_IN_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) ) AND CASE WHEN G.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' THEN 'P' WHEN G.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO' THEN 'R' WHEN G.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' THEN 'O' END =A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_REV_ADJ_TEMP TMP ON TMP.CPPH_CONTRACT_NUMBER= TO_CHAR(A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) AND TMP.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID=TO_CHAR(A.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID) AND TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID=A.ETL_CYCLE_ID AND TMP.ETL_CYCLE_id>0 AND A.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE='A' ) T1 WHERE T1.ETL_CYCLE_ID = T1.MAX_ETLID_FROM_CPPH

TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CALCULATE_MATRIX_CODE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.CHRG_CATLG_KEY, A.AMOUNT, A.EFFECTIVE_DATE, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILLING_CYCLE, F.BILL_DATE, ( B.DPI_ENV || '|' || B.CHRGE_CD) AS CPPH_PROD_PART_CODE, A.CHARGE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, A.ADJUSTMENT_TRANSACTION_ID, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, B.CORE_PRD, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, B.CHRGE_CD, B.PROFILE_MAP_CODE, D.END_DATE, A.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_CHRGE_CATLG B ON B.CHRG_CATLG_KEY = A.CHRG_CATLG_KEY AND A.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN B.EFFEC_STRT_DT AND B.EFFEC_END_DT LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' /* Fix for Initial Load cross Join*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST G ON G.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY=E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY and G.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY =A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and G.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE F ON G.BILL_CYCLE_ID=F.ID /* ends here */ WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND A.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND F.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND NVL(A.AMOUNT,0)!=0 AND A.ACTIVITY_FLAG <> 'O'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I','I', IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, 'B','U','O') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B',i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG,'B','U') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='Z','I', i_ACTIVITY_FLAG)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_ACTIVITY_FLAG

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
--DECODE (1, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG = 'O' OR i_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='B', i_OUT_DATE --,i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' , --ADD_TO_DATE(i_IN_DATE,'MONTH', i_AVG_CTRCT_DUR),i_CTRT_END_DATE)
DECODE (1,
v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CTRT_END_DATE AND i_OUT_DATE > i_CYCLE_END, i_OUT_DATE,
v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CTRT_END_DATE AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CYCLE_END, i_CYCLE_END,
v_ACTIVITY_FLAG = 'O' OR v_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='B', i_OUT_DATE ,i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' , ADD_TO_DATE(i_IN_DATE,'MONTH', i_AVG_CTRCT_DUR), i_PROF_MAP_CD <> 'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' AND i_CHARGE_TYPE='T', v_CPPH_START_DATE, i_CTRT_END_DATE)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_END_DATE
v_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD) , IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),'C', IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),'L','C')), i_LDR_CHLNG_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_LDR_CHLNG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: ROUND( IIF ((i_PROF_MAP_CD = 'INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_FEE_POB') AND i_RESIDUAL_PRICE = 0 , 0 , IIF(v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_QUANTITY) AND i_QUANTITY>0,i_QUANTITY,1)*i_LDR_RATE , IIF((ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE), IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_QUANTITY) AND i_QUANTITY>0,i_QUANTITY,1)*i_CHLNG_RATE, v_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE ))) ,2 )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CTRT_END_DATE AND i_OUT_DATE > i_CYCLE_END, NULL, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CTRT_END_DATE AND i_OUT_DATE < i_CYCLE_END, i_CYCLE_END )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I', v_CPPH_START_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U' or v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B', i_CYCLE_BEGIN, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),i_CYCLE_BEGIN, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND NOT ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Product that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, i_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I','I', IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, 'B','U','O') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B',i_ACTIVITY_FLAG, IN(i_ACTIVITY_FLAG,'B','U') AND i_CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG='Z','I', i_ACTIVITY_FLAG)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_ACTIVITY_FLAG

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF( i_FIRST_BILL_DATE<TO_DATE($$HISTORY_END_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE), TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_DPI_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(1,v_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' AND i_BILL_PERIOD_END_DATE < v_CPPH_END_DATE,i_BILL_PERIOD_END_DATE, NULL )
---IIF (i_ACTIVITY_FLAG ='O' , i_BILL_PERIOD_END_DATE)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE (1, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='I', v_CPPH_START_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='U' or v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='B', i_BILL_PERIOD_BEGIN_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),i_BILL_PERIOD_BEGIN_DATE, v_ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND NOT ISNULL(v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE),v_CPPH_TERMINATION_DATE )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CONH_EFFECTIVE_FROM

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: TO_CHAR(i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_USI) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_ID) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_KEY) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_PROMO_SEQUENCE) || '-' || TO_CHAR(i_DPI_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_TAX_CON_PROD_PART_NUM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Promotion that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY, A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, C.PROF_MAP_CD, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, F.BILLING_CYCLE, C.DPI_ENVRN, C.TARIF_CD, C.SVC_TYPE, C.PRD_CD, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILL_DATE, C.REDMPT_PCT, A.USI, A.PROMO_KEY, A.CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ID, C.CORE_PRD, A.PROMO_ID, A.PROMO_SEQUENCE, D.END_DATE AS CONTRACT_END_DATE, A.CPPH_FIRST_RECUR_PER_ST_DT, A.DPI_START_DATE, A.CA_ACTIVITY_FLAG FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON A.QUALIFYING_PRODUCT_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND A.STD_START_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' /* Fix for Initial Load cross Join*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST G ON G.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY=E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY and G.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY =A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and G.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE F ON G.BILL_CYCLE_ID=F.ID /* ends here */ WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND A.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND F.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND NVL(A.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,0)!=0
